Welcome to my blog!

18 Jul 2013

Welcome to my new Jekyll blog!

I just switched from GitHub Pages to Jekyll, mainly because UnBot is a dead project. Also, I just have a Linux-focused blog and of course the TPI blog, so a blog on programming would be great!

I will try to talk you a bit about what am I doing and other stuff here.

I hope you enjoy my blog!
